rows.label: tev016101_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016101_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Ian about conditions in NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016101_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016101_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Ian if anything is troubling him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016101_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Ian about the Biahno water-purification plant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016101_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Ian if anything is troubling him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016101_MSG0001
rows.name:
It's ridiculous for a city that supports as many people
as New LA to have only a single water-purification
plant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016101_MSG0003
rows.name:
If our population were to expand any further,
water shortages would be inevitable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016101_MSG0004
rows.name:
...What? You're wondering about that large pool of
liquid that lies unused beneath the city?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016101_MSG0005
rows.name:
No, that's a shock-absorbing gel that was used to
lessen the impact of our crash landing. It isn't potable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016101_MSG0006
rows.name:
But it IS the reason that the Habitat unit was able to
land safely after it separated from the White Whale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016101_MSG0009
rows.name:
My research team is working to facilitate the
construction of a new water-purification plant
outside the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016101_MSG0010
rows.name:
However, the team is divided on how to proceed,
and having to reconcile the differences has slowed
our progress.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016101_MSG0011
rows.name:
Ajoa wants to begin building immediately,
while Rosie feels that would be premature.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016101_MSG0012
rows.name: Personally, I agree with Ajoa.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016101_MSG0013
rows.name:
But as team leader, I can't promote either position.
I have to work toward consensus.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016101_MSG0014
rows.name:
Still, having to work through their differences when I'm
personally raring to go has been tough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016101_MSG0022
rows.name:
It's been a long road to this point, but thanks to
Ajoa's hard work, the project is finally complete.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016101_MSG0023
rows.name:
I'm the team leader, but even I have to acknowledge
that this is her babyâ€”she put in a ton of work to
make this dream a reality.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016101_MSG0024
rows.name:
She's like a force of nature, and there's no way I could
compete with that! Hmm... Maybe I should buy her a
present or something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016101_MSG0025
rows.name:
I mean, to show my appreciation for her hard work,
of course! That would be my only motive, I assure you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016101_MSG0028
rows.name:
The completion of the Biahno water-purification plant
has really been a load off my mind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016101_MSG0029
rows.name: But I'm a little worried about Rosie...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016101_MSG0030
rows.name:
She fought tooth and nail against the construction
of the plant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016101_MSG0031
rows.name:
And now that everyone's celebrating its completion,
I'm sure she has some mixed feelings.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016101_MSG0032
rows.name:
I just hope that one day she'll come to appreciate
how our efforts have solved New LA's water shortage.[ST:wait ]
